lead_paragraph: Michael Phelps decided to skip the 100 meters freestyle heats at the U.S. Olympic trials but will be back in the spotlight later on Wednesday with a chance to clinch a spot at the Rio Olympics.

headline.main: Phelps Takes Morning Off Ahead of Big Night at Trials
headline.print_headline: Phelps Takes Morning Off Ahead of Big Night at Trials

snippet: Michael Phelps decided to skip the 100 meters freestyle heats at the U.S. Olympic trials but will be back in the spotlight later on Wednesday with a chance to clinch a spot at the Rio Olympics....
